channel.title: I need to learn to code one
channel.description:
[size=40pt]I wanna make a mini game[/size]
but i have no idea what to do. I can code like making a portal and making it tele you and that sort of stuff.
i want the mini game to be like if you kill 50 certain type of monsters you get a phat(s)
so if you can help id apprectate maybe even reward if you really help.
if its impossible do what i asked suggest anthoer sort of minigame please

item.title: I need to learn to code one
item.dc:creator: @mageblitz mageblitz
item.description:
@mageblitz wrote:

[size=30pt]Ty for the help, but i have no damn idea how to code lol. I’m gonna join ur server when it’s done![/size]

Read full topic
item.source: I need to learn to code one
